locationMovement.label: Move Products
locationMovement.gtSoh: Move quantity cannot be larger than SOH, please check your draft.
locationMovement.deleteMovementWarning: Once delete the draft, all the data in this draft will be cleared and cannot be recovered.
locationMovement.noTableData: Add a product to make a movement. You have not added any products yet.
locationMovement.ltSoh: All the stock on hand need to be moved to actual locations.
locationMovement.duplicateDesLocation: The location under the same lot cannot be repeated, please select a new one
locationMovement.upgradePopup: Your account has been updated the location feature, please move your products to the actual locations first. It may take some time to load the products.
